category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: EPMTask_ignore_tree_display_order
preference.preference_description: Controls if objects of type EPMTask follow the RAC sorting order (as specified by the preference "treeDisplayOrder", modifiable via Edit -> Options -> General -> UI), which indicates whether items are in ascending, descending or no special order. EPMTask_ignore_tree_display_order and EPMTaskTemplate_ignore_tree_display_order should be set to the same value so that EPMTasks and EPMTaskTemplates are displayed in a consistent manner. NOTE: This preference construct is intended only for Workflow types. If the preference is unset or absent, "false" is assumed. Valid Values: * true: Don't allow RAC sorting for objects of type EPMTask. This is the default value. * false: Allow RAC sorting for objects of type EPMTask.
